title: Double Shooting Investigation in Capitol Heights
body:
The Prince George's  County Police Department is investigating a double shooting that occurred along  the 7900 block of Central Avenue in Capitol Heights early this morning.   At approximately 2:44 a.m., officers responded for the report of a shooting near  the MSG nightclub.  Upon arrival officers discovered two victims suffering  from apparent gun shot wounds.  A female victim was transported to a  local hospital in serious condition and a male victim was transported to a local  hospital with injuries considered non-life threatening.  Authorities are on  scene continuing their investigation.  More information will be provided  as it becomes available.Note- Information  contained in this news alert should be considered preliminary in nature. Further  investigation may result in modifications of these facts.
